entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 12:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
